    • Method Detail

      • login

        java.util.Optional<Employee> login(java.lang.String user,
                                   char[] password)
                            throws ServiceException
        Returns the employee Employee by user name and password
        Parameters:
        user - - user nickname which use for entering to the system
        password - - the char sequence of the user password
        Returns:
        Optional of the employee
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if such a combination of user nickname and password not exists

      • getEmployeeById

        java.util.Optional<Employee> getEmployeeById(int Id)
                                      throws ServiceException
        Returns the employee Employee by ID
        Parameters:
        ID - - the employee ID
        Returns:
        Optional of the employee
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if getting such an employee fail

                throws ServiceException

      • updateEmployee

        boolean updateEmployee(Employee employee)
                throws ServiceException
        Update fields value of the employee. Fields available for update: the employee nickname, the employee first name, the employee last name, the employee system role ID, the employee crew role ID.
        Parameters:
        employee - Employee
        Returns:
        true if updating was successful
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if updating fail

        ServiceException - if deleting fail
